thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Value for the price
thread.title_full: Good Value for the price - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pegsina
title: Good Value for the price
text:
This hotel was clean and the room wasn't run down and was large by New York standards.
The attached restaurant is closed (and there was apparently a discount to the restaurant across the street that I wasn't told about) but it didn't affect our trip as we likely wouldn't have eaten there anyway.
Very convenient to theatres, Times Sq etc.
